oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lawyers
Dayton (Tenn.); Rhea County (Tenn.); Scopes, John Thomas; Darrow, Clarence, 1857-1938; Evolution (Biology) - Study and teaching - Law and legislation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John T. Scopes standing between his defenders, Dudley Field Malone and Clarence Darrow.

The Scopes defense team included Clarence Darrow and Dudley Field Malone (1882-1950), who served as assistant defense attorney for Scopes. Malone proved during the course of the trial that his presence on the defense team was indispensable.
